package_json.name: @ryanatkn/orc
package_json.description: a tool for orchestrating many repos

package_json.name: @fuz.dev/fuz
package_json.description: design system for CSS, Svelte, and SvelteKit

package_json.name: @fuz.dev/fuz_library
package_json.description: components and helpers for Svelte, SvelteKit, and Fuz

package_json.name: @fuz.dev/fuz_template
package_json.description: a static web app and Node library template with TypeScript, Svelte, SvelteKit, Vite, esbuild, Fuz, and Gro

package_json.name: @grogarden/gro
package_json.description: task runner and toolkit extending SvelteKit

scripts.build: rm -rf .gro dist && svelte-package && chmod +x ./dist/gro.js && npm link -f
